description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the denial of service vulnerability affecting the Windows mobile broadband driver as described in CVE-2024-43542:

1. Download the appropriate update package from the official Windows Update catalog corresponding to your Windows version and architecture.
2. Install the update to patch the vulnerability and enhance the driver’s functionality.
3. Restart your system to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses issues related to improper input validation and out-of-bounds read, which could potentially lead to system instability. 
- Ensure that you select the correct update based on your system's build number.
- The update packages can be found here:
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).

**Preconditions**:
- Verify the build number of your Windows installation before downloading any updates.
- It's recommended to backup your data before applying system updates.
